H0.text: What hero from Greek mythology was killed by a discus thrown by Apollo, who then named a flower after him, made from his spilled blood. Adonis

H1.text: What hero from Greek mythology was killed by a discus thrown by Apollo, who then named a flower after him, made from his spilled blood. Narcissus

H2.text: What hero from Greek mythology was killed by a discus thrown by Apollo, who then named a flower after him, made from his spilled blood. Orpheus

H3.text: What hero from Greek mythology was killed by a discus thrown by Apollo, who then named a flower after him, made from his spilled blood. Hyacinth

A4.text: Apollo accidentally killed Hyacinthus while throwing a discus.

A5.text: He created a flower from Hyacinthus' spilled blood, the hyacinth.
